Comment: Hello to everybody...This is a game that i played with a lower rated player and i actually won no points...I just did it for fun..So feel free to make any comments or rate the game... i started with e4...
Then he played d6 instead of other more useful movements..
Again worthless move instead of developing some pieces..
d3 to open th black bishop and to protect the e4 pawn...
He was blocking his queen...An unsafe movement i think....
So i challenge d4 in order to opn the game...
Now i have two ways, take the pawn with the knight or the queen... I chose the knight in order to open the queen for the f3 square...

c5? He's still back in development and he played c5! So I had an easy plan in my mind. The plan is simple...i'd let him took the knight and i'll win the game...Of course he should have prevented that but as i said before he's a low rating player so he might took the chance and risk it...
I played the queen in order to checkmated him then...
And as i guessed before he took the knight and ignored the checkmate...
So simple...He forgot to see at his back and at his king's defence...Hope you like it.. Bye and Dag...Haha
